features.ErrorBoundary.bodyText: Refresh the page or try again later. If this error persists, Please contact the administrator.
features.CarInfo.description: This car is currently available and can be delivered as soon as tomorrow morning. Please be aware that delivery times shown in this page are not definitive and may change due to bad weather conditions.
features.CarInfo.favoriteCarsDescription: If you like this car, click the button and save it in your collection of favorite items.
features.CarInfo.unFavoriteCarsDescripti: If you have decided to unlike this car, click the button and remove it from your collection of favorite items.
pages.NotFound.bodyText: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
